name: Stone Lake
description:
Stone Lake is a prototype for a puzzler first-person adventure where you sneak past drones, using the shadows to your advantage. You can encounter:

- Drones with red sight: can see you in the light but not in the dark
- Drones with green sight (night vision): can see you in the dark but not in light
- Switches trigger the map's light to change, resulting in different shadows

Release 0.1.1 contains 4 levels that demonstrate the very core mechanics.
Besides fixes, future updates may contain additional content updates.

Controls:

Escape - Options (look sensitivity and post processing options)
WASD - Movement
Left mouse button - Interact
Space - Jump (not important in the prototype)
C - Crouch (not important in the prototype)

To close the game you're gonna have to press ALT+F4 for now.

This game is dedicated to The Brazen Head and was made in response to their letter sent to me during the Secret Santa Jam.
